articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Tonghungsan Machine Plant under Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Tonghungsan Machine Plant under Ryongsong Machine Complex
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Tonghungsan Machine Plant under the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 He looked round the room for education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Saying that the plant is a factory established under the care of leader Kim Jong Il in the 21st century, he stressed the need to meticulously organize the education through the room so as to help the workers of the plant live and struggle with the pride of working at the place associated with the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went round the pressing shop, processing shop and other places of the plant to learn in detail about the machine production.
					
					 Noting that the plant is the one of great significance in developing the country's machine-building industry, he said that he visited it to turn it into another model plant and standard plant of the country.
					
					 He underlined the need to modernize its production process at the best level in order to economize manpower as much as possible, keep its machine production going at a high rate and thoroughly guarantee the quality of its products.
					
					 Stressing the importance to properly set the goals to be attained in the modernization drive, he urged the plant to attain its first-stage goal by updating and putting on a CNC basis its old equipment and putting its production process on a semi-automatic basis and the second by placing its overall production processes on a complete automatic and streamlined basis.
					
					 He underscored the need to provide the workers of the plant with the best civilization by giving a complete face-lift to the plant through various projects including the one for newly sprucing up its cultural hall for workers.
					
					 Noting that the Party will take charge of the work for modernizing the plant and settle all matters, he called on its officials and workers to determinedly rise up in the efforts for turning it into the country's core machine plant.
					
					 The modernization of the plant is vast but there is nothing insurmountable if its workers make efforts out of the high awareness to firmly defend their revolutionary and class position as befitting the members of the heroic Juche-type working class struggling the way the great leaders did, he noted.
					
					 Accompanying him were Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil and Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test of New-type AA Guided Weapon System
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test of New-type AA Guided Weapon System
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided the test of a new-type anti-air guided weapon system to estimate its feasibility.
					 He was greeted by KPA Air Force General Choe Yong Ho, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, and officials in the sector of national defence science.
					
					 Under his observation, AA rockets were fired to accurately hit mock enemy aerial targets.
					
					 The test verified that the feasibility of the new-type AA guided weapon system is perfect in the light of the latest military sci-tech requirements.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the successful test, terming the success another striking demonstration of the validity of the Party's policy of attaching importance to science and technology of national defence and the rapidly growing defence capability of the DPRK.
					
					 Accompanying him were Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol, Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Jong Sik and Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Congratulations to Vice-Presidents of Myanmar
articles.content:
Congratulations to Vice-Presidents of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on March 31 separately sent congratulatory messages to Myint Swe and Henry Van Hti Yu upon their election as vice-presidents of Myanmar.
					 The messages expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished them success in their responsible jobs.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Myanmar
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on March 28 sent a congratulatory message to Aung San Suu Kyi upon her election as foreign minister of Myanmar. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger through bilateral close cooperation and exchange and wished her good health and great success in her job for the development of the country's foreign relations.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Accuses UNSC of Ignoring Complaint about U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Accuses UNSC of Ignoring Complaint about U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on Saturday gave an answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the UN Security Council is ignoring the complaint about the ongoing U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					 The DPRK demanded the UNSC convene an urgent meeting in connection with the aggressive joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 kicked off by the U.S. despite the DPRK's warning and the international community's unanimous condemnation.
					
					 The spokesman said the DPRK filed the complaint as the largest-ever saber-rattling is disturbing international peace and security and wantonly violating the principle of respect for sovereignty stipulated in the UN Chapter in its scale and nature, adding:
					
					 The action taken by the  UNSC to disregard the complaint about the above-said joint war drills brought into bolder relief that it has been reduced to a political tool loyal to the U.S. as it discarded its mission of preserving peace and security and the impartiality which keeps alive its activities as an international organization.
					
					 It is the UNSC which seconds the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices, failing to bring up for discussion its war for aggression, genocide and state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 The UNSC has lost political and legal justification or moral decency to slap any sanctions against the DPRK as it has turned a blind eye to the U.S. nuclear threats to the DPRK caused by the joint military exercises for over a half a century.
					
					 The DPRK will continue exercising its legitimate right to self-defence by its own efforts now that the U.S. doesn't discontinue the nuclear war games, a vivid manifestation of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, and the UNSC disregards it though it is obliged to protect global peace and security.
					
					 The DPRK has already had access to self-defensive deterrent capable of frustrating any U.S. nuclear threat, blackmail and provocation and will further bolster it up both in quality and quantity as the days go by.

articles.title: DPRK: Young Forerunners in Noble Traits Increase in Number
articles.content:
DPRK: Young Forerunners in Noble Traits Increase in Number
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The number of young forerunners in virtue is on the increase in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					After the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits, tens of thousands of youths have done admirable deeds of devoting themselves to the country's prosperity and the unity and harmony of society.
					
					In Nampho City more than 10 girls volunteered to work in the project for laying Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway last year and at least 40 young people decided to work at the Kangso Coal Mine in January this year.
					
					Among those young forerunners are the senior instructor in charge of the youth league and children's union affairs at Poku Senior Secondary School in Sinchon County, an unmarried man who has taken care of five orphans as their real parents did, and a kindergartener in the Ponghwa Chemical Factory who looks after a child with disabilities with all her sincerity.
					
					There are also a large number of young men and women who married honored disabled soldiers.
					
					Such laudable traits are fully displayed in the course of the ongoing 70-day campaign.
					
					Graduates from universities of education across the country resolved to work at schools on forefront islets and in mountainous villages.
					
					Hundreds of youths, including officials of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, volunteered to work in difficult and labor-consuming sectors for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group's Desperate Fit
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group's Desperate Fit
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a recent crucial report declared that all the dens of the enemy in south Korea including the Chongwadae are the primary targets and the retaliatory operation may start inside the Chongwadae or near it.
					 Fear-stricken by this baptism of fire, traitor Park Geun Hye ordered her stooges to "heighten alertness". The military group at an "urgent operational officers meeting" cried out for  ridiculous "punishment" while talking about "examination of the posture to cope with provocation" at a time when shrill cries "the Chongwadae is the primary target" and "it is a contingency" are heard from among puppet forces.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary ridicules this fuss as desperate fit of those warned of severe punishment while daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces who are nothing but cannon-fodder and bullet shield of the U.S. try to stand up against the invincible and powerful revolutionary Paektusan army. This cannot but provoke boisterous laughter.
					
					 The blind horse is hardiest. The puppet group is making desperate efforts to punish someone, unaware that it is fated to go to ruin. This reminds one of a tiger moth flying into flames.
					
					 When the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces mount a powerful preemptive attack to turn the dens of the enemy into a sea of flames, there will be no one to sign a surrender document.
					
					 The Park group's trumpeting about "punishment" will sound like a dirge precipitating its doom.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Warmongers' War Drumbeats
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Warmongers' War Drumbeats
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Defense Minister Han Min Gu and Commander of the Marine Corps Ri Sang Hun of south Korea separately toured units of the puppet army on the forefront on March 28 to bluster that "north's provocation means self-destruction" and that "soldiers should be bold enough to pull the triggers".
					 Commenting on these outbursts, Minju Joson Saturday says:
					
					 These are foolish and reckless remarks of those obsessed with confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and nothing but bluffing of those fated to go to ruin, 
					
					 It is the disgraceful tradition of the U.S. imperialists in which they have sustained bitter setbacks in face of the DPRK since the 1950s, but it is the glorious tradition of heroic Korea in which it has mercilessly beat the former who boasted of its military muscle.
					
					 Through the ultimatum of the long-range artillery force of the large combined unit of the Korean People's Army on the front the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK gave the last chance and showed the only way out to the puppet forces that committed the thrice-cursed high treason.
					
					 An opportunity is not always given to them and there is a limit to our self-control and patience.
					
					 If the puppet forces persistently keep to the road of treachery, trying to test our last warning, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will turn into ashes in a moment the positions of the enemy for causing all evils and tragedies of confrontation and national division through intensive deadly strikes.
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers would be well advised to bear in mind that no one will survive to regret their act of paying no heed to our last warning.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns Japan for Rushing Headlong into Militarism
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns Japan for Rushing Headlong into Militarism
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Japan obsessed with the ambition to revive militarism and launch overseas expansion has finally entered the phase of enforcing the "security legislation" on March 29 despite the strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					 This means unhesitatingly embarking upon the road of overseas reinvasion, oblivious of the lesson taught by its defeat more than 70 years ago. It is a serious threat to the world peace and security and an unpardonable war crime. 
					
					Japan's enforcement of the "security legislation" in total disregard of the just voices demanding the abolition of the war law reveals before the world its true colors as a war state after completely discarding the mask of "peace-loving state" which it has worn for form's sake.
					
					 The ruling forces of Japan are now vying with each other to claim that the enactment of the law helps tighten the "Japan-U.S. alliance" and provides "a guarantee for the consolidation" of the defense system of Japan and "it is indispensable for Japan to prevent a war."
					
					 Japan, a state for aggression and war, is now driving the chariot of militarism at breakneck speed to reemerge "greater Japanese empire," backed by the U.S. keen to world domination.
					
					 It is the consistent ambition pursued by Samurai Japan to launch reinvasion to conquer the world with the backing the U.S. since its defeat in World War II.
					
					 Right after the defeat the Japanese reactionaries have made desperate efforts to remove legal and institutional mechanisms obstructive to overseas aggression.
					
					 Especially the present ruling authorities have become more undisguised in their moves to revise laws for justifying overseas aggression while talking about the "departure from the postwar system" and the revision of the "Pacifist Constitution".
					
					 They not only officially raised issues of turning Japan into a major military power and launching overseas aggression as state policies but also worked in real earnest to form the National Security Council and map out a strategy of the national security modeling after the U.S. war mechanism.
					
					 Abe, after naming a new Cabinet the "Cabinet challenging the future", dismissed 10 cabinet ministers from offices at a time and appointed his confidants to those posts in a bid to adopt the "security legislation".
					
					 It is by no means accidental that the public opinion at home and abroad is terming Abe's Cabinet the one which has realized the ancestors' long-cherished desire, branding it as the "war cabinet" and the "cabinet aimed at long-term office".
					
					 The present Japanese ruling forces are shouting "bravo" for the fact that they can further boost the military cooperation with the U.S. by enforcing the law.
					
					 But Japan is sadly mistaken.
					
					 The U.S. which Japan so deeply trusts is not the only superpower in the world and its bluffing is nothing but an ill-advised bravery of Hitler who brought about ruin by himself in return for going against the trend of the justice of history.
					
					 Only death and doom awaited Japan which has entered the road of world domination backed by the U.S. through the conclusion of "Katsura-Taft Treaty".
					
					 What is deplorable indeed is that Japan is rushing headlong into overseas aggression with outcries for the tightened alliance with the U.S., failing to discern between what is right and what is wrong in the past and properly understand the trend of the present situation.
					
					 What matters is that Japan is making profound confusing of right and wrong to mislead public opinion in a bid to create impression that the enforcement of the "security legislation" is to cope with the DPRK's "threat".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that Abe blustered the cooperation between Japan and the U.S. would be developed whenever the north Korea launches ballistic missiles by enforcing the law and the chief Cabinet secretary claimed the enforcement of the law helped guarantee the people's life and peaceful living under serious security environment surrounding Japan.
					
					 Japan has infringed upon the sovereignty of other countries so far but no country has invaded or threatened Japan.
					
					 Even now there is no country threatening Japan.
					
					 It is unpardonable that Japan turns a blind eye to such a reality and openly tries to join in the aggressive military moves of the U.S. which is technically at war with the DPRK under the pretext of coping with someone's "threat".
					
					 The DPRK's service personnel and people will never tolerate Japan keen to launch militarist reinvasion without liquidating the past crimes before the Korean people.
					
					 Japan which enacted the war law obsessed with the anachronistic ambition for reinvasion will meet a miserable war disaster again and will have to regret it forever. -0-

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Racket Slammed
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Racket Slammed 
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Regional Headquarters of the Commonwealth of Independent States of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on March 27 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for persisting in the moves for isolating and stifling the DPRK and the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 The Park Geun Hye group is getting frantic with operations to fellow countrymen, not content with offering south Korea as a nuclear war theatre of outsiders, the statement charged.
					
					 Intolerable is that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are kicking off the very dangerous racket to get the sun of the country and nation eclipsed while staging the largest-ever joint military exercises for invading the DPRK, it said.
					
					 The regional headquarters will wage a more dynamic struggle against the U.S., war and Park to check and frustrate the reckless provocations of the U.S. imperialists and the Park group risking their lives, obsessed with the anti-DPRK moves and confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Military Hit for Demanding Compensation
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Military Hit for Demanding Compensation
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The All-Island People's Measure Committee for Checking Jeju Military Base and Realizing Island of Peace, the Measure Council for Checking the Building of Jeju Naval Base and the Kangjong Legislation Fund-raising Committee in south Korea issued a joint statement on March 30 rejecting the puppet military's unreasonable demand for compensation.
					 The statement recalled that the navy on March 28 brought a suit against inhabitants in Kangjong village, peace activists and organizations opposed to the Jeju naval base project for compensation following the postponement of the project.
					
					 It is like putting a cart before the horse that the navy responsible for an undemocratic and illegal project is shifting the blame for the postponement on to the inhabitants and activists who have continued peaceful resistance, the statement held.

articles.title: U.S. Service Women's Strutting in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Service Women's Strutting in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A service woman under the 2nd Division of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea committed violence on a south Korean inhabitant on a road of Uijongbu City, Kyonggi Province on March 27, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The 22-years old service woman, who was wondering about street drunken at mid-night, committed violence hurling slanders and abuses and wielding her fist at a Korean in his 40s.

articles.title: March Issue of Magazine Thongil Published
articles.content:
March Issue of Magazine Thongil Published
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans released the March issue of the monthly socio-political magazine Thongil.
					 The magazine carried photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un. It devoted much space to his revolutionary activities in March such as his meeting with the scientists and technicians in the field of researches into nuclear weapons and his guidance over the work of mounting nuclear warheads on ballistic rockets and news that he watched the ballistic rocket launch drill of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the simulated test of atmospheric re-entry of a ballistic rocket.
					
					 It carried statements issued by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the KPA General Staff and special statement by the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK as regards the fact that the situation on the Korean peninsula reached uncontrollable grave phase due to the nuclear war exercises and hideous provocations by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					
					 It also carried articles dedicated by experts of Russia and other countries for the Korean affairs to prove the injustice of the U.S. and its followers' "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 An article dealt with the negative effect of the shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Zone on the inter-Korean relations and its subsequent damage to south Korean businesses.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 26 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said that Kim Il Sung was the great hero and liberator of the Korean nation who was acclaimed and held in high esteem by the Korean people for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years. It went on:
					
					 He defeated the two formidable imperialist enemies in one generation.
					
					 He was the brilliant Songun commander who founded the revolutionary armed force of the DPRK, liberated the country from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and led the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' aggression to victory.
					
					 The preparations for adding shine to his immortal exploits and significantly greeting the above-said meeting are brisk worldwide.
					
					 We will make a positive contribution to it.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Germany
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Germany on March 27.
					 Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un from the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung this year.

articles.title: Group for Study of Korean Culture Formed in Germany
articles.content:
Group for Study of Korean Culture Formed in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The German Group for the Study of Korean Culture was formed in Koeln on March 26.
					 Manfred Schneider, director general of the MS Travel Company of Germany, was chosen chief of the group.
					
					 He said that the group would make contributions to helping the German people know better about the DPRK, promoting the understanding between the peoples of the two countries and boosting bilateral friendly relations.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills against DPRK Condemned by Brazilian Organization, Figure
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills against DPRK Condemned by Brazilian Organization, Figure
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- An organization and figure of Brazil strongly condemned the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					 The Brazilian Centre for Peace and Solidarity with Peoples said in a statement on March 23:
					
					 We resolutely denounce the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					
					 By staging the military drills the U.S. and south Korean authorities brought into bold relief their war-thirsty nature encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and harassing the regional peace and security.
					
					 We demand the U.S. conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and withdraw its troops from south Korea.
					
					 We support the peaceful reunification of Korea and extend full support to the Korean people's just cause.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, in a statement on the same day said that the U.S. imperialists are leaving no means untried to stifle the DPRK, adding that the U.S. will not bring down socialist Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Self-Development Is Treasured Sword of Victories: Newspaper of DR Congo
articles.content:
DPRK's Self-Development Is Treasured Sword of Victories: Newspaper of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The DR Congo newspaper La Prosperite carried an article titled "Self-development of the DPRK" on March 17.
					 The newspaper said that the word "self-development" is now being often heard in the DPRK.
					
					 In an article subtitled "Treasured sword of victories" it said:
					
					 Self-development is the force making one grow strong by oneself.
					
					 The Korean people could build the firm self-supporting national economy and manufacture and launch satellites in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 DPRK's self-development is indeed the treasured sword that helped the Korean people advance along the road of victory despite all trials of history.
					
					 In an article subtitled "Driving force for building thriving nation" the newspaper noted:
					
					 In the DPRK that regards self-development as an important motive force for building a thriving socialist nation, the principle of giving priority to self-development based on the modern science and technology is being stressed and the drive for educating all the people to be well versed in science and technology and developing the country into a science and technology power is progressing apace.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation by their own efforts, technology and resource as they are maintaining the principle of giving priority to self-development.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Slam U.S. and Its Followers' Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Slam U.S. and Its Followers' Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 26 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for ratcheting up the sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The statement denounced the U.S. imperialists and their followers for cooking up the brigandish "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN Security Council over the latter's justifiable H-bomb test and satellite launch.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and the U.S. and its followers' sanctions are criminal and illegal ones aiming at stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's resolute counter-action is entirely just and legal as it is for coping with the hostile forces' sanctions.

articles.title: Russian Organization Fully Supports All Measures of DPRK for Self-defence
articles.content:
Russian Organization Fully Supports All Measures of DPRK for Self-defence
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group are bound to meet self-ruin.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said this in a statement on March 26.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 We fully support the large-scale intensive striking drill of long-range artillery force of large combined unit of the Korean People's Army on the front for wiping out the Park Geun Hye group.
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to bear in mind that if it acts rashly, the Chongwadae and reactionary ruling machines will be blown up in a moment.
					
					 We wish the DPRK bigger success in its work for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We fully support all the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK and extend firm solidarity to the Korean people.

articles.title: British Organizations Censure Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Censure Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK on March 25 made public a joint statement denouncing the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys for ratcheting up the sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The statement said the U.S. and its followers are working hard to stifle the DPRK by slapping unilateral sanctions in the wake of railroading UNSC's "sanctions resolution" No. 2270 against the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution" is nothing but a criminal document devoid of impartiality, legality and morality as it assumed retaliatory character banned by international law in the light of its contents and method of application, it noted, adding:
					
					 All the progressive organizations in the UK reject and denounce all the UNSC's resolutions on sanctions against the DPRK as they wantonly violate its sovereignty and international law.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Usher in a New Golden Age of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on a website on March 27.
					 The work published on March 25, Juche 104 (2015) refers to the fact that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il indicated the way ahead of the Juche-oriented physical culture and sports with their outstanding idea and leadership and opened a fresh history of building the sports power.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for building the sports power.

articles.title: More U.S. Human Rights Abuses Disclosed
articles.content:
More U.S. Human Rights Abuses Disclosed
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A British medium reported on March 28 that the CIA had been keeping photos of naked prisoners suspected of terrorism as secret documents, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					The CIA left the prisoners naked before sending them to other place for more brutal torture.
					
					This was another evidence bringing to light the true colors of the U.S., the worst human rights abuser.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Maquinas de Tonghungsan de Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Maquinas de Tonghungsan de Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas de Tonghungsan del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					Antes de todo, el Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					La Fabrica de Maquinas de Tonghungsan se levanto en el siglo XXI bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo y continuo que deben organizar con escrupulosidad la labor de educacion por medio de la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria para que los obreros vivan y luchen con el orgullo de trabajar en el lugar en que estan impregnadas las huellas sagradas del Dirigente.
					
					El Mariscal estudio en detalles el estado de produccion de las maquinas recorriendo los talleres de prensa y de elaboracion y otros lugares.
					
					Dijo que esta fabrica tiene importante significado en el desarrollo de la industria de maquinaria del pais y que el vino para transformarla como nueva fabrica modelo y estandar que representa las fabricas de maquinas de nuestro pais.
					
					El Mariscal subrayo que tienen que modernizar en maximo nivel el proceso de la produccion para ahorrar cuanto sea posible la mano de obra, normalizar en alto nivel la produccion de maquinas y garantizar seguramente la calidad de los articulos.
					
					Es importante trabajar bajo las correctas metas a ser alcanzadas por etapas de la modernizacion, senalo y prosiguio que en la primera etapa hay que realizar la renovacion de los equipos viejos, la aplicacion de CNC en ellos y la automatizacion parcial en el proceso productivo y en la segunda etapa deben lograr la perfecta automatizacion y la cadena en todos los procesos productivos.
					
					Tienen que construir modernamente la casa de cultura de obreros y cambiar radicalmente el ambiente de la fabrica para que los obreros disfruten a sus anchas de maxima civilizacion, enfatizo.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que el Partido solucionara con responsabilidad todos los problemas que se presentan en la modernizacion de la Fabrica de Maquinas de Tonghungsan y exhorto a los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica a empenarse junto con el mismo por la lucha por transformar la fabrica en la planta medular de maquinas del pais, a partir del sentimiento de dar primeros pasos desde ahora.
					
					Aunque es muy enorme el trabajo de modernizacion de la fabrica, no habra nada que la imposibilidad si los obreros de la fabrica luchan con la decision de defender con firmeza la base revolucionaria, la clasista, como clase obrera heroica de los grandes Lideres y de tipo jucheano, subrayo.
					
					Al Mariscal le acompanaron Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil y Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige tiro de ensayo de cohete interceptor antiaereo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige tiro de ensayo de cohete interceptor antiaereo
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el tiro de ensayo por el juicio de capacidad combativa del sistema de arma teledirigida de intercepcion antiaerea de nuevo tipo.
					El Mariscal fue recibido por el general de ejercito de las fuerzas aereas, Choe Yong Ho, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y los funcionarios del sector de la ciencia de defensa nacional.
					
					Bajo la presencia del Mariscal el cohete interceptor antiaereo destruyo con acierto el blanco aereo enemigo.
					
					A traves del disparo de ensayo, fue comprobado el hecho de que la capacidad combativa del nuevo sistema de arma teledirigida de intercepcion antiaerea, investigada y desarrollada por nuestras fuerzas y tecnicas, llego completamente a la demanda de ultramodernas ciencias y tecnicas militares.
					
					El Mariscal dijo con gran satisfaccion que este exito de hoy deviene otra manifestacion de la justeza de la politica del Partido de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional y de nuestra capacidad de defensa nacional que desarrolla vertiginosamente.
					
					Al Mariscal le acompanaron Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol, Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Jong Sik y Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC denuncia CS de ONU
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC denuncia CS de ONU
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU da espaldas a la acusacion a los ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 2 la siguiente respuesta: 
					La RPDC exigio al Consejo de la Seguridad de la ONU convocar una reunion emergente, en relacion con que a pesar de la advertencia de la RPDC y la unanime censura de la sociedad internacional, EE.UU. desarrollo por fin junto con el Sur de Corea los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16.
					
					En su tamano y caracter, los presentes ejercicios destruyen la paz y la estabilidad internacionales y violan flagrantemente los principios de respeto a la soberania estipulados en la Carta de la ONU, razon por la cual la RPDC los acuso. 
					
					Pero, el CS de la ONU dio espaladas a la acusacion de la RPDC, exponiendo a plena luz que esta organizacion internacional se ha convertido en un aparato politico fiel a EE.UU. abandonando toda su mision de garantizar la paz y la seguridad y la imparcialidad considerada como vida en las actividades de organizacion internacional.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU es un aparato que aprueba el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de su miembro permanente americano, sin poner sobre el tapete tanto las guerras de agresion como las matanzas y el terror estatal. 
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que hace la vista gorda a la amenaza de guerra nuclear a la RPDC que sigue mas de medio siglo debido a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de EE.UU., perdio completamente la calificacion politica, juridica y el honor moral de ejercer la sancion sobre la RPDC.
					
					Puesto que siguen los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., expresion concentrada de la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC, y le da espaldas el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que asume la mision de defender la paz y la seguridad internacionales, la RPDC ejercera de continuo su justo derecho de autodefensa. 
					
					Tenemos el disuasivo de autodefensa capaz de frustrar la amenaza, el chantaje y las maniobras de agresion de toda indole de EE.UU., y su poderio se consolidara mas en lo cuantitativo y cualitativo con el paso del tiempo.

articles.title: Corre carruaje militarista desfrenado, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Corre carruaje militarista desfrenado, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- Pese a la fuerte protesta y rechazo internos y externos, Japon enloquecido por la rehabilitacion militarista y la ambicion de expansion a ultramar, puso en vigor el dia 29 de marzo, al fin y al cabo, la "ley de seguridad".
					 De esta manera, el pais isleno volvio a tomar sin vacilacion el camino de agresion a otros paises olvidando la leccion de derrota de hace mas de 70 anos, lo cual deviene la grave amenaza a la paz y seguridad del mundo y el imperdonable crimen de guerra.
					
					 La ley en cuestion esta compuesta de las dos leyes: la "ley de arreglo de la legislacion de paz y seguridad" y la "ley de apoyo a la paz internacional".
					
					  La primera ley enmendo en conjunto las 10 leyes, entre ellas, la de "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", la de situacion de ataque armado, la de emergencia periferica y la de cooperacion de actividades de la ONU por el mantenimiento de paz.
					
					  La segunda esta relacionada con el envio de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a ultramar.
					
					  En fin, esta ley puesta en vigencia deviene la infame inventada con el objeto de abrir el camino de agresion a otros paises.
					
					  Al ejecutar la "ley de seguridad" despreciando las voces justas en demanda de la abolicion de la ley belica, Japon mostro ante el mundo su aspecto verdadero del Estado belicoso quitandose completamente la mascara del "Estado pacifista" mantenida de manera formal hasta la fecha.
					
					  Ahora, los gobernantes japoneses dicen que la reciente medida "garantizara" el fortalecimiento de la "alianza Japon-EE.UU." y la "consolidacion" del sistema de defensa de Japon y es "indispensable para frenar de antemano la guerra".
					
					  Japon, Estado agresivo y belicoso enloquecido por la guerra y convertido en el carruaje militarista, corre desenfrenadamente hacia la rehabilitacion del "imperio japones" junto con EE.UU. que persigue la hegemonia mundial.
					
					  Despues de derrotados en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, los samurais de Japon han venido persiguiendo invariablemente la ambicion de emprender la reagresion para conquistar el mundo bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					  Por eso, los reaccionarios japoneses hicieron esfuerzos desesperados por eliminar los aparatos legales e institucionales que servian del obstaculo de la agresion a ultramar.
					
					  En particular, las actuales autoridades japoneses hicieron mas abiertas las maniobras de enmienda de la ley para legalizar la agresion a ultramar hablando de la "liberacion del sistema posbelico" y la revision de la "constitucion pacifista".
					
					  No solo presentaron oficialmente como politica estatal los problemas para convertir el pais en potencia militar y reagredir a otros paises, sino tambien inventaron el Consejo de Seguridad Nacional y establecieron la estrategia de seguridad nacional imitando el mecanismo belico de EE.UU.
					
					  Abe quien denomino el nuevo gabinete como "gabinete de desafio al futuro", destituyo a la vez a los 10 ministros y los sustituyo por sus complices para aprobar a toda costa "ley de seguridad". 
					
					No es casual que la opinion publica califique el gabinete de Abe de "gabinete belico que intenta mantener el mandato a largo plazo y llevo a cabo la mala intencion de sus antecedentes".
					
					Los gobernantes japoneses en actual mandato inflamados por la fiebre militarista expresan con satisfaccion que la vigencia de la "ley de seguridad" fomentara mas la cooperacion militar con EE.UU. 
					
					Pero, Japon esta equivocado. 
					
					EE.UU., confiado tanto por el pais isla no es la "unica superpotencia". La fanfarroneria del imperio americano es igual a la imprudencia de Hitler que sufrio la autodestruccion por haberse opuesto a la justicia de la historia. 
					
					Japon emprendio el camino de hegemonia mundial junto con EE.UU. mediante la firma del "Tratado Taft-Katsura" y otros, pero sufrio solo la derrota. 
					
					Sin embargo, este pais miserable se dirige a la agresion a ultramar hablando del fortalecimiento de la alianza con EE.UU., sin distinguir lo justo de lo injusto sobre la corriente de la epoca.
					
					Lo problematico es que Japon induce en error la opinion publica diciendo como si la vigencia de la "ley de seguridad" se necesitara para hacer frente a la "amenaza" de la RPDC. 
					
					El premier Abe disparateo que la vigencia de la ley "intensificara la cooperacion entre Japon y EE.UU. en el momento de lanzamiento de misil balistico del Norte de Corea", mientras el director del secretariado del gabinete dijo que se defenderan la subsistencia y el ambiente pacifico de vida de la poblacion desde el riguroso ambiente de seguridad en torno a Japon". 
					
					Hasta la fecha, en varias oportunidades Japon habia infringido gravemente la soberania de otra nacion, pero ningun pais le agredio ni le ejercio la amenaza. 
					
					Debido al intento de Japon de ocupar con armas el territorio coreano, estallaron muchas guerras pequenas o grandes como la Rusia-Japon y la Qing-Japon, causando incontables desgracias y sufrimientos al pueblo coreano y los demas asiaticos. 
					
					En la actualidad, no hay tampoco un pais que amenaza al pais isleno. Sin embargo, Japon se incorpora a las acciones militares agresivos de EE.UU., que esta en beligerancia con la RPDC, bajo el pretexto de "hacer frente a la amenaza" de alguien. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos no toleraran jamas a Japon que atente a la RPDC con la ambicion militarista sin liquidar todavia sus tremendos crimenes del pasado cometidos contra el pueblo coreano. 
					
					Japon sufrira otra vez la tragedia de guerra y se arrepentira de haber puesto en vigencia la infame ley de la guerra con la anacronica ambicion de nueva agresion.
